attributes.action: Gordon Brown should be proud to represent a Scottish constituency and show this by wearing a kilt whenever he appears in front of the media
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown should be proud to represent a Scottish constituency and show this by wearing a kilt whenever he appears in front of the media or when in Parliament, telling English MPs what he intends to do in England.  
Ideally, all appearances in Westminster by Scottish MPs, should be followed with bagpipes, playing, "Flower of Scotland," and a new Westminster Tartan designed, which all members of the house should be forced to wear, to show their respect for the ruling Labour Party and their Leader.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
